pages.text: A few expansions to vanilla features are included. These are most quality of life changes that make the game more enjoyable. From small things such as the $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/spyglass-improvements)spyglass zoom$() being always usable to named pets dropping $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/broken-nametags)broken name tags$() as a memorial. More $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/more-mob-variants)mob variants$() and $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/guard-villagers)guard villagers$() have been added plus $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/amendments)items amended$().

pages.title: Supplementaries
pages.text: $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/supplementaries)Supplementaries$() adds a lot of new useful vanilla+ items. Such items are shown in the spotlight. The bomb is a great throwable weapon that explodes on impact without destroying blocks.$(br)The altimeter is the tool to measure your depth as the coordinates from the F3 menu have been removed.$(br)The bamboo spikes are great for traps especially against the new buffed mobs.$(br)The globe is a great decoration item that can be used to show off your world map.
